casebody.data:
GENERAL MEDICINE P.C., et al., Respondents,
v.
James A. BROCKENBROUGH, M.D., et al., Appellant. WD 80528, WD 80551 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: July 17, 2018
Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied August 28, 2018
Application for Transfer Denied December 4, 2018 Jonathan Sternberg, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Ashlyn Buck Lewis, Topeka, KS, Co-Counsel for Appellant. James Myers, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Respondents. Dawn Parsons, Kansas City, MO, Co-Counsel for Respondents. Michael Barzee, Kansas City, MO, Co-Counsel for Respondents. Before Division One: Lisa White Hardwick, P.J., Thomas H. Newton, and Edward R. Ardini, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Dr. James A. Brockenbrough appeals a Jackson County Circuit Court judgment entered on a jury verdict finding that he breached his employment contract with General Medicine, P.C. and slandered the company by making certain statements to its customers. The court awarded General Medicine $1.1 million. For reasons stated in the memorandum provided to the parties, we affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
